title: Novavax, Moderna, Tesla: What to Watch in the Stock Market Today
sub_head: Novavax jumps after Covid-19 vaccine-maker completes submission to Canadian regulators; Moderna slips after FDA delays decision on use in adolescents
body:
Wall Street started the month on the front foot, with the S&P 500 up 0.2% in early trading. Here’s what we’re watching in the market today.
High-speed trading firms are paying brokers billions of dollars a year to execute options orders, leading them to promote the risky trades whose popularity has boomed among small investors. Here’s how Robinhood Markets cashed in on the derivatives frenzy.
